name: Pineapple Protector
description:
Game made for a mini game jam with friends, made over 2 days

Theme 1 : [Protect it] Theme 2: [Strange Combinations]

You are the head chef at  a restaurant serving strange food to your customers. People outside overheard you serving 'pineapple pizza' to your customers and WANT  BLOOD. Protect your patrons from the bloodthirsty food police and serve them as much food as you can before they decide to leave!
